preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 48.40 g of Bismuth using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 19.57 g of Erbium, ensuring it is finely powdered. 
 3. Weigh 61.75 g of Lead, taking care to avoid contamination. 
 4. Finally, measure 29.88 g of Yttrium. 
 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle or mechanical mixer to blend the powders thoroughly for at least 15 minutes.
